about_the_game:
Moon Drop Miners is a high stakes roguelite puzzle resource manager all about building and balancing your mining rig in the gritty frontier of space.


Build and Balance

Slam down structures and watch your resource numbers rise or plummet. Every structure you drop can boost intake or push your rig to the brink of collapse. It’s all about fine tuning Energy and Stability to keep your rig operational and your moon in one piece.

  • Strategic Placement: Each structure has unique benefits and risks, gaining bonuses or penalties for their place in your rig.

  • Chain Reactions: Clever layouts can trigger powerful synergies or disastrous meltdowns.

  • Energy Stability Tug of War: Power your structures without letting Stability drop below critical levels, or risk catastrophic failure.

Survive and Optimize

Race against the clock to meet your quotas. Balance short term survival with long term growth, maximizing your gains without risking total shutdown.

  • Rising Quotas: Collect enough Celestium or lose your contract for good.

  • Risk vs. Reward: Push your rig to the limit but know when to pull back.

  • Adaptive Strategy: Reevaluate your approach as quotas rise and cosmic storms throw a wrench in your plans.

Upgrade and Expand

Earn cash and discover new ways to power up your rig. From game altering unlocks to specialized satellites, every improvement helps you delve deeper, gather more, and meet your next quota.

  • Satellite Support: Equip specialized orbiters that grant unique bonuses and triggers that dramatically alter how you build your rig.

  • Unleash Your Potential: Combine upgrades to create unstoppable mining synergies.

  • Unlock More Options: Between runs unlock more structures to build and moons to mine.

Key Features

  • Endless Replayability: Each contract offers fresh challenges, ensuring no two mining shifts are ever the same.

  • 100 Structures, Each with 2 Upgrades: Experiment with different structures and discover powerful combinations that push your rig to new heights.

  • 50 Satellites: Master specialized orbiters that offer varied synergies and play styles.

  • 10 Distinct Moons:  Explore unique celestial environments, each demanding new strategies.

  • 5 Difficulty Levels: Ramp up the stakes or dial them down to find your perfect challenge.

  • Synthwave Space Rock Soundtrack: Immerse yourself in cosmic vibes as you mine the frontier.

  • Detailed Stats Screen: Track every resource, upgrade, and milestone to fine tune your approach run after run.

short_description: Moon Drop Miners is a high stakes roguelite puzzle resource manager set in the gritty frontier of space mining. Drop structures to build your rig, balance Energy and Stability, and scramble to harvest enough Celestium before your shift ends... Or watch your entire operation collapse.
